__e: He's got something to smile about and that's a fact.
You don't have to sit across the table... and smile at him and that daughter of his every morning of your life.
"so what could I do but laugh and go?"
How can you smile at me and say that after the way you've treated me!
Why are you smiling at me like that?
Is it morning already or did you just smile at me?.
He will stand soon in front of you and smile at you.
Do you mind if I smile at people?
Yeah, well if she smiles by somebody I know... she'll have to buy herself a new set of teeth.
You'd be an even prettier girl if only you learned to smile a bit.
But if you hear it again after a few years, you're already smiling a little, thinking:
Can't you give me a little smile?
I feel more like wringing your neck than smiling at you, I feel like sinking slowly into you.
You might at least smile or have you forgotten me?
All right, let's smile, or whatever you people do for a living.
I was going to tell you to smile more.
And also, will make you want to SMILE! more.
Then, let me hear you laugh again.
What I want in regards to your life and to your future, is to see you smile again.
